title: BOARDWALK / TRASH CAN
description: A TRASH CAN OH BOY. Its an interaction.

dialogueTree.title: Trash Can: "There's some tare, an empty cigaret..."
dialogueTree.text: There's some tare, an empty cigarette package, and a crumpled kebab wrapper in the trash bin.

links.title: Trash Can: "Two empty bottles of 'Touloula' vod..."
links.text: Two empty bottles of 'Touloula' vodka and a can of black 'Potent Porter' is all you find.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "No. There's more in there. 'Livis'..."
links.text: No. There's more in there. 'Livis' strawberry liquor, plus some pilsner bottles too. Better not pick them up, they seem unhygienic.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A tragedy..." The lieutenant looks..."
links.text: "A tragedy..." The lieutenant looks in the can, eyes watering from the smell.

links.title: Empathy: "He shakes his head with genuine sad..."
links.text: He shakes his head with genuine sadness.

links.title: Trash Can: "Whoever tossed it here was a heavy..."
links.text: Whoever tossed it here was a heavy smoker: the brand name reads 'Red Astra'.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "'Red Astra' is the black market ver..."
links.text: 'Red Astra' is the black market version of 'Astra' cigarettes, known for their high tar content.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Now, this makes partying look *bad*..."
links.text: Now, this makes partying look *bad*. Still -- don't let it sway you. *You're* responsible.

links.title: Trash Can: "You see traces of mayonnaise and ke..."
links.text: You see traces of mayonnaise and ketchup on it, as well as a tomato wedge. The wrapper reads: 'SHISH KEBAB REVACHOL'.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "It's no older than a day, or two. N..."
links.text: It's no older than a day, or two. No mould yet.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "It's hard to concentrate in the sme..."
links.text: It's hard to concentrate in the smell. The sea air brings some relief.
